title: [Question] Are there no sears for admission through pes kcet merit list ?
content: Help me out and are they planing on increasing the seats

comments.body: Exactly my doubt bro if they haven’t segregated seats for jee and kcet pes counselling itll be a mad screwup

look total seats reserved for JEE MAINS+KCET is 45% which is 320 seats for CSE out of 720

Out of these 320 maybe its 260 for mains+60 for kcet... and in these 260 for mains there is overbooking of seats which will be adjusted in the 60 kcet seats..
I think that's what they said in yesterday's councelling meeting
did they give the exact seats for mains and kcet?
No.... But if you are saying that there will be 60 seats for KCET ( assuming that it's 60 ) then there won't be much left for KCET after JEE.
yup if its 60 then KCET seats for PES EC campus CSE will be less
There is seat reserved for pesu kcet da but donot expect seats in triple digit for each branch and campus
The overbooking seats are merged from pesu kcet so yeah it's. Over
5% is reserved for cet i think
no 5% is left for cet
5% def not triple digits
5% of 720 is 36... possible but ig it will be around 60
Wtf does it mean when they write negative numbers??
Bro what does a minus indicate I didn’t understand that
oh but thats what they said in counseling, maybe extra seats due to management or something?
Oh okay... maybe management seats then.. will wait and see... they will release the number of seats for kcet soon ig
Overbooked seats
Overbooked seats
What does that mean. I’m getting PES through KCET. Will this affect the no if seats assigned to KEA counselling .
Idk..... Maybe they will decrease the seats for KCET from 60 to (60-34=)26 maybe they will have more no. of people in one batch.
WTFFFF . Bro I don’t think they can do that . KCET seats are already reserved . If they try to do anything with those seats, the KEA has full authority to take action against them.
Not the KCET Merit seats dude... the KCET 5 lac seats through PES counselling

overbooked   
they prolly hope that enough people will surrender their seats when kcet results come.
The exact number is 252(mains)+72(kcet).. i.e. 10% of the total seats in every branch is reserved for KCET 5 lac seats.... Prof Jawahar mentioned this in his latest interview..
